SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am24.model.card

Class GameCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am24.model.card.GameCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
InitialCard, PlayableCard
public abstract class GameCard extends Object
The GameCard class represents an abstract game card with corners, an image ID, and a kingdom. It provides methods to manipulate and retrieve information about the card.

    Constructs a GameCard with the specified image ID, symbols for corners, and kingdom.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameCard

      public GameCard(int imageId, Symbol[] symbols, Kingdom kingdom)
      Constructs a GameCard with the specified image ID, symbols for corners, and kingdom.
      Parameters:
      imageId - the ID of the image associated with the card
      symbols - an array of symbols to be assigned to the card's corners
      kingdom - the kingdom associated with the card

  • Method Details

    • setFront

      public void setFront(boolean front)
      Sets whether the card is front-facing or not.
      Parameters:
      front - true if the card is front-facing, false otherwise

    • getCorners

      public ArrayList<CardCorner> getCorners()
      Retrieves the list of corners of the card.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of CardCorner objects representing the corners of the card

    • getCornerByIndex

      public CardCorner getCornerByIndex(int index)
      Retrieves a specific corner of the card based on the index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the corner to retrieve
      Returns:
      the CardCorner object at the specified index

    • getImageId

      public int getImageId()
      Retrieves the image ID associated with the card.
      Returns:
      the image ID of the card

    • getKingdom

      public Kingdom getKingdom()
      Retrieves the kingdom associated with the card.
      Returns:
      the Kingdom of the card

    • printCard

      public String printCard()
      Returns a string representation of the card.
      Returns:
      an empty string representation (to be overridden by subclasses)

    • getView

      public GameCardView getView()
      Generates a GameCardView representing the view of the card.
      Returns:
      a GameCardView object representing the view of the card

    • getViewForMatrix

      public GameCardView getViewForMatrix()
      Generates a GameCardView representing the view of the card for display in a matrix.
      Returns:
      a GameCardView object representing the view of the card for matrix display
